# nyczips

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Provides a tibble of New YorK City zip codes and a simple features collection of their ZCTA polygons.

## Installation

You can install the development version of nyczips like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("kjhealy/nyczips)
```

## Example


```{r example}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(nyczips)

nyc_zips


zip_sf
```


```{r pressure}
ggplot(zip_sf) + geom_sf() + theme_void()
```
